name: Senior #19 - Nomi
description:
Nomi is a 68-year-old jewelry appraiser who enjoys recycling, collecting Bauhaus art and watching IKEA furniture assembly tutorials on YouTube. He is brave and smart, but can also be very petty and a bit judgemental.
 
He is currently single and defines himself as pansexual. His most recent romance was with a ventriloquist named Pete. They broke up because Pete couldn't cope with Nomi's illegal activity of giving unsolicited art museum tours.
 
Nomi's best friend is a trans-woman named Edna who is a then-cleaner-turns-into-bookshop owner. They are inseparable and enjoy making dumplings together.
